title: Natural Remedies Archives
author: Heather Dessinger
description: Time-honored and researched-backed natural remedies, plus tips for supporting immunity, restful sleep, healthy respiratory and digestive function.
cleaned_text: Combining traditional wisdom and modern research for smart, naturally-minded mamas. Subscribe to my newsletter and receive this FREE DIGITAL GUIDE containing 25+ natural remedies you can make with kitchen ingredients along with exclusive coupons, links to recommended products, and much more! I'm Heather, aka The Mommypotamus. I'm a wife, mom, real food lover, research geek, and amateur homesteader. And potamus... obviously.
